short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable additional features in Google Chat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin enables some extremely needful features in Google Chat. 

▣ Polling ▣
Enhance your Google Chat experience with the new polling feature! Collect instant feedback and make decisions faster than ever.

▣ Text Snippet ▣
Snippets provide a convenient method for quickly sharing portions of code, text or configuration files etc.

▣ Popout Chat ▣
Pop out Google Chat into a separate browser window so you can drag it to another desktop when using multiple desktops.

▣ Canned Responses  ▣
Use the 'canned response' to send pre-written or templated replies in the chat. You can also create custom canned responses.

▣ Audio Recorder  ▣
Quickly record audio right from your Google Chat and share across spaces.

▣ Screen and Video Recording   ▣
Capture screen with audio and video, record video with audio, take a photo.

▣ Sketchpad    ▣
Create drawings, flowcharts, or sketches and share them across your team or personal chats.

▣ Dictation ▣
Dictation assists in converting speech to text and enables writing in languages that are not possible using a standard ASCII keyboard.

▣ Location sharing  ▣
Share your current location or any arbitrary location in Google Chat with a link to Google Map

▣ Encrypt and Decrypt Message ▣
Encrypt your confidential message with a password to keep it secure from unauthorized access.

▣ Bookmark ▣
Bookmark your crucial messages to save them to your bookmark list for easy reference later.

▣ Reminder ▣
Set reminders for your important messages to ensure timely notifications

▣ Schedule A message ▣
Set up your message to be sent at a later time.

▣ Code and Code Block ▣
Send code snippets pre-formatted to maintain its structure and readability.

▣ Copy Link ▣
Copy the direct link to a message and share with people. 

▣ Color And Audio Preview ▣ 
Get a quick preview of the Hex Colors and Audio links present in the chat.


Need Help ?
--------------------
Email: support@tabgraf.com
Website: https://tabgraf.com


Release Notes
--------------------------
6th Jun 2024 - Added new features → Conduct Polling
18 April 2024 -  Text Snippet, Popout Chat, Canned Responses new feature addition
7 Feb 2024 - Video, Screen recording, Camera, Dictation new feature addition
21 November 2023 - Message scheduling new feature addition
25 May 2023 - Fixed a minor bug in "quote" feature.
25 Apr 2023 - The latest release includes several minor bug fixes and introduces a new feature called Bookmark. Additionally, the "quote" function now functions properly in threaded chats and replies.
11 September 2022 - Released new version with dozens of new features including audio recorder, encrypt-decrypt message, color preview, location sharing, code formatting, reminder, text transform.
28 February 2022 - Released quote and copy link feature.
